dialogues.DialogueText: Ooooo, I love pirates! Can I be the captain?
Lemme at ‘em! Let's attack them! Let's surround them!
Excellent idea! If three of us surround one of them, it will be much weaker. Looks like there are some cannons and generators to help us too.
I see the captain of the ship! His beard is on fire! He looks like a meanie!
That’s Blackbeard. You're right, Hally. Blackbeard is a meanie.
...I still want to be captain of the ship.
Stand next to the wheel and you could pretend you are... I guess.
Yay! Then I can sail it to outer space!
One final thing... use WASD to move the camera, L to switch the view, and scroll to zoom.
Is everybody ready? Let's get to the stern of the ship!
I’ll race you to the back of the ship!
